folder: Richmond Avenue & Merrill Avenue, Staten Island, NY
text:
1535 Richmond Avenue, east side, between Merrill Avenue and Acron Street. The house was owned in 1874 by Mrs. Turner, and in 1907 by Mich. Bitito. (see maps).

May 21, 1932

P. L. Sperr

Merrill Cemetery (Staten Island): A view north. The cemetery is situated on the north side of Merrill Avenue, 260 feet west of Richmond Avenue.

May 21, 1932.

P. L. Sperr.
title: Cemeteries - Merrill Cemetery - Staten Island

folder: Richmond Avenue & Merrill Avenue, Staten Island, NY
text:
1583 Richmond Avenue, east side, adjoining (to the south) Merrill Avenue. Beers's map of 1874 shows the house to have belonged to C. Dunn.

May 19, 1935

P. L. Sperr
